node.name: Pdf4Eclipse
node.shortdescription:
Pdf4Eclipse is a pdf viewer plugin for Eclipse. One of its notable features is a complete integration of SyncTeX, which allows forward and inverse search in pdf files. Hence, it is perfectly suited to work as a viewer for documents created by TeXlipse.

Features

  • Two different pdf renderers to support of a wide range of pdf documents
  • Bookmarks can be shown in the outline view
  • Uses the look-and-feel of Eclipse
  • Supports links in pdfs
  • SyncTeX integration
  • Automatically reload when pdf changes
  • Written solely in Java
  • Open-Source
node.body:
Pdf4Eclipse is a pdf viewer plugin for Eclipse. One of its notable features is a complete integration of SyncTeX, which allows forward and inverse search in pdf files. Hence, it is perfectly suited to work as a viewer for documents created by TeXlipse.

Features

  • Two different pdf renderers to support of a wide range of pdf documents
  • Bookmarks can be shown in the outline view
  • Uses the look-and-feel of Eclipse
  • Supports links in pdfs
  • SyncTeX integration
  • Automatically reload when pdf changes
  • Written solely in Java
  • Open-Source
